verses.name: Acts 20:5
verses.text: These going before tarried for us at Troas.

verses.name: Acts 20:6
verses.text: And we sailed away from Philippi after the days of unleavened bread, and came unto them to Troas in five days; where we abode seven days.

verses.name: Acts 20:7
verses.text: And upon the first day of the week, when the disciples came together to break bread, Paul preached unto them, ready to depart on the morrow; and continued his speech until midnight.

verses.name: Acts 20:8
verses.text: And there were many lights in the upper chamber, where they were gathered together.
